name: 84asanchez
body:
Rent our lovely Duboce Triangle flat for 2 months
Available June and July 2014 (starting May 26)
Fully furnished
$4,465/mo includes rent, garbage, electric, cleaners 2x/month, internet

We love where we live. 84A Sanchez is on the most perfect block of San Francisco, a hub of public transportation, good food, shopping, arts, bike paths, parks, and trees. You are close to everything, yet the neighborhood feels residential and cozy amongst urban life.

The details:
- 2 bedrooms - 1 large with a cal king bed, 1 small with a queen bed
- potential 3rd bedroom - we use it as a den
- large living room with bay window, includes piano and 4 other stringed instruments
- large, beautiful kitchen with 4-burner stove
- private, large backyard with a hammock
- large laundry room with washer and dryer
- 1 split bath with clawfoot tub
- Victorian period details

![Living Room](https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10101002723071723&set=a.10101002722932003.1073741830.211418&type=1&theater)

![Den](https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10101002723176513&set=a.10101002722932003.1073741830.211418&type=1&theater)

![Second bedroom](https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10101002723316233&set=a.10101002722932003.1073741830.211418&type=1&theater)

![Split bath](https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10101002723391083&set=a.10101002722932003.1073741830.211418&type=1&theater)

![https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10101002723630603&set=a.10101002722932003.1073741830.211418&type=1&theater](Laundry Room)

![Kitchen 1](https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10101002723870123&set=a.10101002722932003.1073741830.211418&type=1&theater)

![Kitchen 2](https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10101002723725413&set=a.10101002722932003.1073741830.211418&type=1&theater)

![Yard](https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10101002724039783&set=a.10101002722932003.1073741830.211418&type=1&theater)

![Master Bedroom](https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10101002724299263&set=a.10101002722932003.1073741830.211418&type=1&theater)

![Master Bedroom Built-Ins!](https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10101002724468923&set=a.10101002722932003.1073741830.211418&type=1&theater)

Optional:
- use our car while we're away
- 2 bikes available
- inflatable kayak

Within 500 paces of our home:
- Duboce Park & Duboce Park Cafe
- Restaurants: Chow, Chilango, Amasia Sushi, Jasmine Garden, Ike's Sandwiches, Chile Pies, Thorough Bread
- N-Judah, K/L/M/J MUNI lines
- Produce: Courtney's Market, Golden Natural Foods, Whole Foods, Safeway
- Essentials: Walgreens, CVS
- Books Inc.
